function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The reliance on technological advancements may lead to the neglect of basic public health measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and transmission due to a false sense of security","Mitigation":"Emphasize the importance of basic public health practices alongside technology, and educate on the limitations of technology in disease control","Technologies":"Technologies should be complemented with public health measures such as hand hygiene, social distancing, and mask-wearing","People":"Public, communities, and individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, government, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Rapid adoption of new technologies without proper testing and validation may result in unforeseen consequences","Impact":"Potential negative impact on public health due to unanticipated issues or vulnerabilities in new technologies","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous testing and validation protocols for new technologies, involve experts in public health and epidemiology in the development and deployment process","Technologies":"New technologies such as AI, IoT, and 5G communications","People":"Technology developers, regulators, and public health experts","Owner":"Technology companies, regulatory bodies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate data protection and privacy measures in the utilization of Big Data and IoT for health services may lead to confidentiality breaches and misuse of personal information","Impact":"Risk of privacy violations, data breaches, and unauthorized use of sensitive health information","Mitigation":"Implement robust data protection and privacy regulations, encryption of health data, and regular security audits for IoT and Big Data systems","Technologies":"Big Data, IoT","People":"Healthcare providers, patients, and individuals whose data is collected","Owner":"Data protection authorities, healthcare organizations, and technology companies"}]}
